nodes.bodyText: I used to name these like completeInner() or completeWork() but I now like to keep the name even closer to the public method, and the single 2 character is the smallest difference, yet still communicates sequence. Thoughts?
perhaps call the outer method completeWrapper() ?
actually, complete() and completeInner() would be fine to me as well.
Also, I saw somewhere naming scheme such as complete() and doComplete().
